definitions.definition: happening or done before the usual or expected time.
(of a plant or crop) flowering or ripening before other varieties.
happening, belonging to, or done near the beginning of a particular time or period.
done or occurring near the beginning of the day.
examples: we agreed to meet at 6 a.m. to get an early start

definitions.definition: denoting or belonging to the beginning or opening stages of a historical period, cultural movement, or sphere of activity.
occurring at the beginning of a sequence.
examples: the earlier chapters of the book

definitions.definition: before the usual or expected time.
examples: I was planning to finish work early today
synonyms: in the early morning; Moreat dawn
at first light "Rachel has to get up early"before the usual time; prematurely
ahead of schedule; literarybetimes "they hoped to leave school early"

definitions.definition: near the beginning of a particular time or period.
examples: we lost a couple of games early in the season

definitions.definition: near the beginning of the day.
examples: I wrote this piece early one morning

definitions.definition: before the present time or before the time one is referring to.
